forms.name: port
forms.label: Port
forms.tooltip:
Default ports:
  110 - POP3,
  143 - IMAP,
  993 - IMAP+ssl,
  995 - POP3+ssl self-signed

forms.name: advanced
forms.label: Advanced options
forms.tooltip:
Optional mailbox flags used for PHP imap_open, for example:
/tls - to force use of start-TLS
/ssl - use the Secure Socket Layer
/validate-cert - to validate certificates from TLS/SSL server
